emerald.description: The Emerald ParaTime is our official EVM Compatible ParaTime providing smart contract environment with full EVM compatibility.

social.description: Be part of the community and stay in the loop on everything Oasis

transaction.warningMultipleTransactionsSameHash: Please make sure you're looking at the right transaction. There is more than one transaction with this hash, which is extremely rare. We are showing the most recent successful one.

currentFiatValue.title: Current fiat value
currentFiatValue.explanation: Calculated using current rate. Value at the time of transaction might have been completely different.
